CacheName: Unique name for the cache, used as a key into the cache collection
SoftComponentRef: The component observed by this object for either playback or recording
bIsSimulating: Capture of the initial state of the component before cache manager takes control.
bPlaybackEnabled: Whether this component is enabled for playback, this allow a cache to hold many component but only replay some of them.
USDCacheDirectory: USD cache directory, if supported for this simulated structure type.
